description: A Flutter widget class 'MenuResultCard' that displays a card with either a generated dish image (from URL or base64) along with its name, or an error message if generation failed. It styles itself based on the app theme and adapts to error states.

classes.name: MenuResultCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a card that displays either an image with caption or an error message, styled consistently within the app theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the menu result card, displaying image or error badge accordingly.
